lead_paragraph: Officer Gerald Veneziano, 26, who was shot shortly after calling in a report about a suspicious vehicle, was in critical condition.
snippet: Officer Gerald Veneziano, 26, who was shot shortly after calling in a report about a suspicious vehicle, was in critical condition.

headline.main: Manhunt for Suspects in Shooting of Officer in New Jersey
headline.seo: Suspects Sought in Shooting of Officer in Fairfield, N.J.
headline.print_headline: Manhunt for Suspects in Shooting of Officer in Fairfield, N.J.
